values: I'M ENGAGED!!! Eric proposed Friday evening. We went for a quick walk before band practice and I went off the path to try and get a better view of this waterfall. And when I turned around, he was down on one knee with a ring. Right behind me. It was beautiful. Perfect really. I'm so happy and excited! I only wish we had the means to have the wedding like, next week! haha I've already registered at about 4 places. And I'll probably do more. I'll have to eliminate some. I'm trying hard to lose weight. I'm actually working out and cutting back on a lot of the junk I was eating. And I can't seem to get enough water. Unfortunately though, I'm a pretty bloated. :/ But that will pass. I just wish I could fit into my church clothes. BUT.....I'M ENGAGED TO MY BEST FRIEND!! Eeee! ;D Sad news-our(my family's) cat died. He was hit by a car on the main road. Eric spotted him. My sister is beside herself. He was her baby. I just finished up another round of sobbing. I was looking at his baby pictures and...yeah. We miss him terribly. It's just not the same without him. He was THE coolest cat. He literally changed lives. We made a nice grave. I just hate that we're moving soon and we can't take him with us. He was a member of the family. It's like having to bury your brother somewhere where you'll never be able to go again. R.I.P. SamWise Gamgee I'll miss your kisses. I'll miss your purr. I'll miss your meow.

My family is so poor. 
It sucks.
I've gotten used to the feeling of an empty stomach.
But that's ok-I think I may have actually lost a couple of pounds.
So, it's a good thing.
But having Aislin here...that's more difficult.
I always find something for her. But she'd rather have junk food. 
She is a kid.
So she throws a lot of fits.


I have such a headache.
And cramps.
I can't wait to get all of this "fixed".
I'm sick of this.

My sister was in the hospital 2 nights ago.
She's had this pain in her side for a year or 2 now and she suddenly got a fever of 104. Turns out she has an abdominal infection and cervicits(from the infection). But she's doing better. They pumped her full of antibiotics.

 
My head is killing me.
I'm done with this.

It's looking like there may be something serously wrong with me-health wise.
I don't want to get into the details here-especially before I get to the doctor.
But I could use some prayer.
I'll be going to get tests next Tuesday.

When you're flat on your back...noone rememebrs all of the good things you've done.
All of the hard work that you did.
They look at you now and call you a "bum" and other things that make you feel like shit about yourself.
Tonight I just wanted to die.
I haven't felt like that in a long time.

Eric is my rock. 
He's the only one who makes me feel worthwhile anymore.

So, my 24th birthday is in about 8 hours and I've gotten no cards, no calls, nada. Yeah, I'm a little depressed right now. Oh I did get a fucking bill for $202 from that damn coffee shop. My dad said he'd help me pay it. I really hope he keeps his word on that. Eric's taking me out tomorrow. I know we're going to an italian restaraunt and I think he's getting me the Skynyrd shirt I want-yes! But I really hate that I have no friends to celebrate with. Hell, the last few years-what a bitch. I had to call everyone, give directions, plan everything...and some of the people that showed up I barely knew. And some I was very out of touch with(no, that was not MY fault). Man...I don't think I realized just how sorry my life is until now. At least I have my wonderful fiance. Eric is the best. I cannot wait to marry him. And to spend the rest of my life with him. He's my best friend. There's noone else. He was made for me and I for him. Well, I'm gonna finish my food and maybe have a drink or two.

One of the kittens had to be put to sleep.:*( He came out and he was breathing weird. So, when he didn't get better after a few minutes, I took him to the vet. They thought the same thing I did-that there was fluid he couldn't get up. Simple enough-just pump it out. Well, when they went to put the pump in his mouth, they found the problem. He had a cleft pallete. So, even if he did nurse, none of it would go to his stomach and he would starve to death. I cried like a baby. In that short time I grew attatched to him. He was beautiful. He was gray, had long hair and a mohawk! I wanted him. I really, really wanted him. It seems like every kitten she has that I want, dies. They were really sweet at the vets. The doctor was very genuine. You don't see that a whole lot. I told her I didn't have any money and I broke down thinking about how that poor thing would have to suffer because of it. But she said, "No no no-don't worry about it!" Wow. The other kittens are perfect. 5 left. 2 black ones, an orange one, a beige one and a white one. The beige and white ones surprised us. Eric decided we're taking 2 instead of just one. The orange one and the white one. I'm almost positive the orange one is a girl and the white one a boy. The orange one is the smallest one. So cute! If it is a boy and girl, their names are going to be Rosco and Daisy. And then in a couple of years we want to get an english bulldog and name him Diesel and get another dog(female) and name her Dixie. I'm really sad about that little one. Thankfully Ron was in a good mood most of the night(at work)- so, I didn't stay upset all night. Eric and I are going camping for 4 days. I'm up doing laundry. He's asleep. My head is pounding.

Lexi's in labor.
I'm slightly annoyed because I am so tired and I had just gotten comfortable when she started crying.
But I'm also excited.
She's going nuts trying to find a place to have them.
My mom and I tried to get her to chill out next to the couch on some towels, but she wasn't having that.
She kept trying to get INTO the couch, in my mom's room, behind the couch...*sigh*
Once she starts to push, I'll make sure she's next to me(by the couch).

Right now her contractions are still pretty spaced out. So, she'll probably have them somewhere between 7 and 9. Well, have the first one somewhere in there. Ya know there can be up to an hour between kittens? Oi. I hope that's not the case. It wasn't last time.

Poor girl. She' crying and panting and restless.
I'll go sit with her.

I'm so damn sleepy.

I'm anxious.
I'm annoyed.
I'm hopeful.
I'm happy.

Oh and I'm listening to country music.
Yes, it's ok for you to laugh at me.

My Aisybug is in town.
We played outside for a little while today. Played cards and Trouble.
Yesterday I made her a fort(with a sheet) and she slept in there so Eric could sleep on the couch.
Tomorrow we may make a HUGE fort while everyones at work.
And play outside some more.
We were going to go fishing and to the park with Eric's neice and nephews Friday as a late birthday thing for her. But it's going to be in the low 50's. Damnit. Now I have no idea what we're going to do. I'm so broke. Ugh.
Yeah it's been in the 80's for a while now. I thought we'd be able to do that for sure.

Life is looking up.
Eric is a blessing.
Our relationship is a blessing.
I fall more and more in love with him.

We're both starting new jobs soon.
Money will be less of a problem. But he's going to be my boss. Good thing he'll be in the office and I'll be driving all day-or we might really get annoyed with eachother.

We're hoping to buy a house-rather than rent.
But I must get a car first.
Thought Brandon's(his guitarist) stepdad would be more sympathetic and give us a good deal on one of his cars. But he wants way too much. Like he needs money-he's freaking loaded. But Brandon said he'd try and talk him down. Especially since I need it SO bad and the car needs a little work.
Pray that I get a car soon. A reliable car. 
Without a car, I can't move forward.
My job is all the way in Gainesville-like 30-45 minutes away.

Bedtime.
Ais is going to keep me busy tomorrow.

Can someone please pop my hip back in to place?? Ppplllleeeeaaasssee?!?

It hurts so bad. I'm about to start crying. Again.

In exactly one month I will be 24. And I'm dreading it. It's one step closer to 25. One step closer to 30. I'm getting ollld. In 12 days, it will me and Eric's 6 month. Half a year! That's insane. But great. I need to keep in touch with people. I'm bad about that. And then I get mad at them for not keeping in touch with me. Oi. But yeah, a lot of people have been on my heart lately and I plan on at least attempting to let them know that. I need to stop getting sick all of the time. It aggrivates people. Myself being one of them. But it's not like I can help it. And really, sometimes people don't believe me. I hate that. I'm not a hypocondriac. Damnit. At least God knows I'm not faking. I would think throwing up 6-10 times in the span of about 5 hours is proof enough. No? Whatever. Love you guys and girls.

The Eagles.

Hell yes.








I wish Eric would let me have guys as my "bridesmaids"(I guess I could say brides people). Because honestly, the only people I want standing behind me on that day are Luke, Anthony and my sister. But they'd probably think it was a dumb idea anyway. I have no close girl friends. Maybe I'll make some before we get married and I can shove them in matching taffeta gowns. Haha not really. Taffeta...eww.
But yeah, Luke and Anthony have been the best friends. Everyone else flakes on me. Or they get aggrivated that I am a parent and can't always hang out so they just stop calling me all together. Bastards. Yeah-that fucking hurts.

Anywho...
Tomorrow Eric and I are spending almost all day fishing. We went out yesterday and found a new spot-caught 2 small mouth bass. 
It's a beautiful spot. Sand, river, bridge, trees, rocks...
I always feel so bad about killing the fish. But i love fishing. *sigh*
I'm really excited. 

Bye.

After band practice, Eric came over and we went to get food. First, we went to QT and I got Excedrin Tension Headache medicine. About $1. Then we went to McDonalds and I got a # 10-large. About $5/$6. After that, we went to Steak-N-Shake where I got a Turtle shake- $3.50, give or take. So, I just threw up about $10. Lovely. But I do feel a little better. I'm gonna go lie down next to my 'hubby' now. Man I love him. I can't wait to be Mrs. Michael Eric McQueen.^-^

The flu, pms, an infection added with a fucked up hip and neck, sleeping on a couch that is getting more more messed up thanks to my fatass sleeping on it.... SUCKS!!! I've been in hell for about 4 days now. My whole body hurts. And only one thing makes the pain go away. But I'm sick of that. Ais got sick a couple of days before her birthday, so, she stayed in Statesboro and we were going to go see her, but we didn't have the money for gas. Bryan gave her a little party. And Eric and I are going to throw her something when she gets here for spring break. She and Eric's nephews and niece can play. Oh-Eric's 4 year old nephew said he's going to marry me when he grows up. How cuuuuute! hahaha A lot of things suck right now. But Eric and I are wonderful! I love him so much. He's the best friend I've ever had. When you're really sick (and it shows!) and your signifigant other can look at you and tell you you're beautiful...and mean it...and say it without you coaxing them or fishing for it...you know they love you. Things are going to get beeter. I WILL get a car. We WILL move out before too much longer. We WILL lose this God awful winter weight. It's so hot. Hit about 80 degrees today. And we were in the car all day. With no a/c. In...Atlanta traffic. And I was sick as crap. I think I'll go lay down. I think the Nyquil is kicking in.

Things are going pretty well. Ais has been in town since Saturday. She's going back Saturday. I wish I had money so I could have done more with her. And feeling better would have beennice too. I've felt so tired and just blah lately. I'm sure if I ate healthy and on somewhat of a schedule, I'd feel a heck of a lot better. I may be getting a second job. She seemed to be pretty interested in hiring me. Here's hoping... I've been looking into taking some baking classes. Georgia sucks. There are no diploma programs to be a pastry chef anywhere. So, I'll get my certificate and that should get me an entry level position somewhere. I'd like to work in a nice restaurant. Work my way to head pastry chef. I would love to work somewhere like Charm City Cakes. That would be the best. They only make cakes. It's not some bakery where you can just walk in and get a pastry or something. My mom wants me to go to Europe. She said I should go and I said, "Umm, I have a kid." Her:"Yes and she has grandparents." She said she'd take care of her if I wanted to go to school there for a year. HOLY CRAP! Who are you?! As incredible as going to Paris to learn how to make truffles and pastries would be, I could never leave Eric. He means more to me than Paris. Speaking of Eric... I love him more than ever. He is my best friend. I've never been this close to a guy before. If I get this job, I'll be able to get a car within a month or 2 and then we're getting a place together. >^-^< Later guys and gals.

I'm so frustrated tonight. About a few things. One being that I have virtually no friends anymore. And I'm going to tell all of them just how I feel. Tell them how they've treated me and just let it out finally. Hell, it's not like I have anything to lose. Tori is pretty much the only friend I have left and we really only see eachother at work. Hopefully we can actually hang out sometime soon. It's tough too b/c she's dealing with some stuff and she's got a new guy and works two jobs and I have a boyfriend and work and have no car. But I really hope we can start hanging out regularly and can get closer. Another thing is that Eric doesn't seem to want to meet any of my friends(as stated before, not very many of them anyways). And I really want him to meet Tori. They've seen eachother a couple of times, but that's it. I want to be able to hang out with her and him. And her boy. Like, do couple things together maybe. I love him and I'm proud of him. And it never seems fully official when your boy hasn't met your friends. **SSIIIIGGGHHH** My hip has been killing me today. I cannot wait until I can go to the chiro again. Late New Years resolutions: -Stop letting things that are in the past(mine or his) affect me so much. Let it go, Carla. -Stop thinking that just because you don't have the perfect body that it makes or breaks anything. He loves me. Period. -Stop getting into petty arguments. It's not worth it. -Save some damn money. -Get a car. -Get my own place(or our own place). -Call college and figure out what needs to be done so that I'm eligable to go next year. -Love every single day that the good Lord has given me. There are many more things I could write about, but really, what's the point? Noone read this shit anymore. LJ is just about dead. Not really much point in this entry at all. I think I'll go write my letters to my "friends" now.

I got some great pj pants from my sis(to replace my torn up, paint stained ones). They are so comfy!

And I got a beautiful diamond promise ring from Eric.

I got a few other things, but those two were my favorite.

I also got a Helio Kickflip yesterday-I love sales! 
I'll have it activated this weekend hopefully.
And then I'll take pics of my ring.^-^

Hope everyone had a Merry Christmas!

I love my Eric so much.
I get excited about every new day with him.

I was thinking about how little I'm going to be able to get Aisy this year. I absolutely hate that. I always try and get her lots and lots of stuff. I want Christmas to be magical for her. I want her to have fond memories of every Christmas. But she really doesn't seem to mind if she doesn't get a lot. She is so incredibly mature. Even more than some 20-somethings I know/have known. Sometimes we'll go to the store and she'll want something and I have to tell her no, that I don't have enough money for it. And she's not like those annoying, spoiled kids who throws themselves to the ground, screaming until mommy or daddy gives in. She just shrugs and says, "That's ok. We can get it another time." What 5 year old do you know who would say that? I cannot believe I have thus far raised such an amazing human being. She's going to be a brilliant, wonerful, loving individual all her life. And I just hope I can be there to see all of the amazing things she is going to do. And I pray she get's the opportunity to do those amazing things. God really blessed me by giving me the honor of birthing and raising her. I want her back. I really do. But sleeping on a couch, living in a house where lots of weed is smoked, is not the life or the enviorment I want her in. I'm getting more hours at work and I'm confident that I will be kept on after the holidays. I will work my butt off to get a place for us and to make it a home. I miss her so much. And it makes me regret every spanking and every time I've ever yelled. There really is no reason to yell. I don't want her to be the type of person who screams in an argument. I want her to be the type of person who can keep their cool and speak at a normal volume when in one of those situations. That always seems to work better. And it can really irritate the other person. haha One of the things I hate about her living with Bryan is the fact that he is not a Christian and I vowed to raise her in the way God sees fit. To speak to her regularly about the Lord. And to pray with her. Every Christmas and every Easter, I tell her what those holidays are really about. And she remembers a little more each year. And she has said how much she loves Jesus which makes my heart swell and brings a tear to my eye. I love my little girl. Being a parent...you'd never know you could love so much. And it allows you to see how much God loves you. In other news, Eric and I are going to the mountains Friday night. And we'll be back Sunday night. I'm so excited. We're going to cook together, hot tub and just be together. And I'll get to sleep in an actual bed. Yessss! I can't tell you how crappy it is sleeping on a couch with a hip out of place. And not being petite...ugh. I wake up several times to turn. It's terrible. Sleeping with him though, I sleep like a rock. It's going to be a good weekend.

Dizzy spell after dizzy spell.
Headache after headache.
I'm SICK of this!

I need an adjustment.
I need my neck popped. 
I have to get my spine and hip in place. 
And I need to get my neck curved the right way before it fuses and I get degenerate whatever it is.
I really need to get back into therapy.
Being broke sucks.
I'm going to end up looking like Quasimodo.

Will you still love me then?

We went fishing today.
At the lake.
It was cold.
We got nothing.
It was nice being together outdoors.
It was nice being together all day.

I'm getting more hours at F.Y.E.
That's good.

I still haven't gotten my check from DSI.
If I don't get it soon, I will be calling the labor board, the better business bureau and this other governmental agency that deals with this crap.

I need more time for Christmas shopping.
Once again, it will be a skimpy Christmas.
:-/

Today(yesterday) was pretty good.
Wednesday night we went to Jon, Allison. and Eric's place and had a few drinks. 
Woke up and went to get ready for Turkey Day.
His family is so different from mine. 
And Bryan's family is definitly different than both of our families. Eric didn't know what to make of it. So we, only stayed for about 30 minutes so that Ais could see her Papa(grandpa).

Eric took Ais and I to the Christmas tree lighting downtown Lawrenceville. We got hot chocolate and hot apple cider and listened to Christmas music, saw the tree get lit and saw Santa ride through town in a horse-drawn carriage. It was really nice.

We talked more about the wedding and added an after party-just for friends and us.
No, we're not engaged or getting married anytime soon, we just know that we are going to one day. This is it. We were made for one another.
He's amazing. And he's so wonderful with Ais.
He still gives me butterflies. When he kisses me, I melt. I actually went so weak once, I dropped a cigarette in his lap. haha
It took 3 years of praying-God finally put us together. I couldn't be happier.

Anyways, I hope everyone had a wonderful Thanksgiving!
All day I thought about how thankful I am for my Lord and Savior, for my best friend whom I want to spend the rest of my life with, my little girl, my family, a roof over my head... 
He's blessed me so much. He's given me more than I deserve.
I love my Dad in Heaven. 

How lucky are we to have someone who forgives us every time we mess up and loves us  beyond measure?

I stayed up all night with Chrissy and Sam. Lots fo Jade Empire and sunflower seeds. And then right as I'm about to go to sleep, Chrissy informs me there's no coffee. And my stepdad was about to wake up and if he didn't have coffee, everyone would have heard about it. So, at 6 in the morning I had to go to Wal Mart. And then in my rush, I fell. Thank God only one person saw it. And she was just concerned.
I still ended up getting fussed at. And then when I told my mom that I had not had any of the coffee that had been in there before, she shut up and left the room. And then when she heard me tell my sister that I fell, she felt bad. Yeah.

Everyone left earlier when I was sleeping. I have no idea where they are. And I kinda feel left out. But at the same time, I'm suprised and relieved that my mom let me sleep and took Ais with her.

I really wanna get the Christmas decorations out of the attic, but I have no idea what's what up there.

I miss Eric so much. We haven't seen eachother since Sunday and that's not normal. But he's working so much right now. Around 48 hours a week. It sucks, but at least he's getting his stuff paid off. And I get more time with my bug while she's here.
i seriously cannot wait until our weekend in the mountains.

Sick.
Again.
WTF?!??

My throat has swollen again.
I took an antibiotic and 30 minutes later, my palms were itching like mad! A few minutes later, the bottoms of my feet. And then it spread slightly to my calves, tops of my hands and feet, my forearms, my armpits, my face. But after about an hour it stopped. 
I need to take more antibiotics, but I'm afraid I'll start itching again. But that antibiotic has never done that before.

My whole body hurts. 
I just want to sleep.

I had to get sick while Ais is in town.

I miss Eric.

And where the hell is my paycheck?!
4 weeks and I have yet to see 1 red cent.
Mom:"I wouldn't even consider working anymore until I saw that paycheck!"

I need more hours at F.Y.E.
For real.

AAAAUUUUGGGGHHHHH!!!!
I have tonsilitis again.
I'm so sick of this crap.
I cannot wait until I get benefits and can have these bitches removed once and for all.
Now I'm gonna have to call Kim and FYE cuz there is no way I can work today.

I miss having a bed.

And I wish my boyfriend didn't live 45 minutes away. :(

We spent the whole night together.
Just being young and in love.

I really want an outdoor wedding. In the mountains. In the fall. With the beautiful orange, red, and yellow collage as our backdrop. Vowing our love and commitment to one another with God's glory all around us. 
He'd be willing to do that, because he loves me. But because I love him, I'd be willing to have a church wedding-he's always wanted a church wedding. 

I'm exhausted. Almost fell asleep during church tonight.:/

I cannot wait until we can go to OUR bedroom and climb into OUR bed and fall asleep in one another's arms. Or at leaset close to one another. Because let's face it, that's not always the most comfortable position to be in for lengthy periods. I sleep so well when he's next to me. *sigh*:)

Ok. I'll stop being sappy.

I'm going to sleep. Before I fall into a wall or something. I dunno... 
SSSSLLLLEEEEEEEEEEEEEPP!!!!!

Everyone has said to guard my heart this time. 
Believe me, I intended to.
But he got to me like noone ever has.
We've talked about a wedding. A lot actually. I know, we're crazy. 
Don't worry it's not like we're gonna go elope tomorrow. We're trying to wait at least a year. haha
Man... I love him so much. More than I thought it was possible to love someone. He does so much for me. Like this morning, he drove all the way here to bring me black pants(today's my first day of work at FYE-Sam Goody-and I need black pants and have none). And he had to be at work at 10. 
He searches online for hours for the perfect songs to put on a mix cd for me. He loves every part of me. He does everything and anything he possibly can for me. I know I make him happy-he tells me often. But I want to do more. Always. 
 
When we went to the mountains we stopped at this fruit stand and got boiled peanuts and hot apple cider. I said, "We should do this when we get old." He thought it was a great idea. Even told his mom. "Oh nice...you're going to be a peddler." haha
We were thinking of getting a place up there(once we're married-if that happens...). We love it there. It's so beautiful. Even if we lived in a trailer on the side of the river. We'd be happy. 

So, I appreciate everyones concern-I really, really do.  But this one's different.:)

I hate being without him for even 5 minutes.

And man I really hope I'm not getting arthristis or carpal tunnel in my right wrist/hand. It has got to stop hurting already.

Today was the best.

Eric picked me up.

We picked up lunch for the boys(his nephews) and us and went to the house and ate with them and his mom.

Drove up to the mountains and saw the most beauitful sights ever. The trees on the mountins looked like a patchwork quilt. Stunning!

We sat on a rock in the middle of the river eating brownies.

Went to Anna Ruby falls. I about died walking up there. Being out of shape+smoking a lot = Carla almost dying! Yeah...

We hung out with a few of his friends in Daholonega.

Went to his work and I finally got to meet Perry.

Went to the gas station and saw a kid dancing in the parking lot. I mean he was going at it! Serious face and all. We looked at eachother and busted out laughing.

Went back to his house, ate good food, ordered a movie, he fell asleep with his arm around me(^-^) and then he drove me home. 

When he kisses me I get lightheaded. When he holds me I feel like I'm home. And the fact that I can dance in his car...*ahem*like I did...wow. I'm just so comfotable with him. He's the most amazing guy. I've been blessed so very much. He makes everything better. And I want to do as much as I possibly can to make him happy. 

This is by far the best relationship I have ever been in. 

I love you, Eric McQueen.

Eric and I are going to the mountains today. I'm pretty excited. I'm also just happy to be spending the day with him.>^-^< My hand and wrist are killing me. I have to scan lots of inventory(that's what my merchandising job is) and it's taking a toll on my wrist and fingers. It hurts to the point that I want to cry. Often. I really have to stop procrastinating. Be safe!

I now have 2 jobs. 
ne with a company called DSI-I'm a merchandiser.
And the second with Sam goody which is actually now FYE.

I'm very happy and very much in love.
He's the one.

Hope everyone is doing well.
Love ya.

It looks like I may be working 2 jobs soon!
My mom's friend came over and said she has an availability-scanning inventory at Kroger and Publix grocery stores. And Tori left me a comment saying Sam Goody wants to hire me. How awesome is this? And people deny the Lord... I sat outside just praying for a while the night before. 
I'm excited about this. 
Wish me luck! And thanks for praying for me if you did.:)
That's my boy with his old band. He played me some of their stuff...my boy can wail! His scream is sexy.

I'm sending Ais to stay with Bryan for a little while. That way I can work and get a place to call our own. And when she comes back, she'll have her own space and some stability. And Bryan said Ideserve a break. So...it sucks because I never thought I'd have to do this. But I really think it's for the best. 
I have to go to the courthouse and get temporary custody papers. And once all that goes through, then he'll come and get her. Ugh...

On a good note, Eric and I are doing great. He's just...wonderful.

God bless.

He came over last night. 
We sat in the car and had a long talk. 
And I am so lucky and so happy.
It's insane how quickly i'm falling.
But the one person who usually says nothing or tells me that I'm being dumb, has acknowledged she sees it. And it looks as though she very much approves.

After being single for 3 and a half years, I finally have a boyfriend. And he's wonderful. I've never been treated so well. I'm terrified I'm going to mess this up. I mean, I've dated the last few years, lightly, but nothing ever goes past 2 weeks. We're both pretty scared. We've been hurt really bad in the past. I just really hope and pray this lasts.
Last night at dinner we prayed. It was beautiful. 
I am so happy when I'm with him. 
Tonight everyone was yelling at me. Ais was pissing my parents off, so, they yelled at me. My sister didn't like her room being messy when her friend came home with her; well, even though she had done the vast majority of the mess, I got hell for it. From her AND my mom. Aislin is so defiant lately. I just don't know what to do anymore. I feel like I'm going to lose my mind. He's supposed to come over, but I haven't heard from him yet and when I tried to call it went straight to voicemail. I almost slipped and said that three letter phrase when he last called. I think he may have caught it. But he didn't say anything. So, maybe not.
Ugh. I hope I didn't mess up already. 
Well, I better get offline so he can get through....if he calls.

I, Carla Christine Morgan, have a date this Saturday. Can you believe it?! I know I barely can. And with this really awesome guy named Eric. Eric McQueen.
Exciting!
But of course the ol' weight factor is scaring the shit out of me. I hate being such a fatty....

I think I'm losing my friend. He was so distant and different this weekend. 
I have to say....this really sucks. Especially since I'm out of cigarettes and there's(for once) no beer in the house.

I'm at rock bottom. If it weren't for Tori and Jeremy getting me out of the house...I don't know what...
I love Autumn. 15 more days...

THIS IS THE MOST BORING DAY EVERRRR!!! I'M LOSING MY MIND!! I could be cleaning, but....no. Craaaaaaaapppp. UgsbghkbHGAKSHGSADHGdujfj

I'm at work. We haven't had a customer in at least an hour. Made crap money today. *sigh* time to go home.

I had a wholel entry written. Down the tubes. No time now to write more. Maybe I can at home.

We actually had a cool-ish night last night. I cannot wait for fall! It's the best season of all!
People kept coming in from the oldies concert in the square for coffee and hot chocolate.
We made out pretty well.
My dad left me to go to this place called the barn for praise and worship. And of course, I kept getting slammed.  But I went at a decent pace and noone got aggrivated or anything.

I went to church for the first time in a long time. Well, actually I went a few weeks ago, but I didn't dig it there. This place was different. The music wasn't very good-its a church that usually doesnt allow music, but Pastor Doyle changed that for his. But people were cheering and I suddenly began to cry. I almost sobbed. I was completely overwhelmed. The Lord touched me today and it was simply amazing. I will be going back. And I will be continue to pursue Him and to stop being so afraid of what people think about me, about how I look or sound when I'm praising Him. Because it's not about me. Not at all.

I've read almost everyones entries since I lost my connection to the net on my comp. Just not up to posting comments. But I love you.

I'm putting Aisy's butt in school tomorrow and then she has her first soccer practice. I think I'm more excited than she is. After school we have to rush to Athens to get cleats. Or at lest some decent sneakers(cleats aren't required for that age group).

I'm hot and tired.

Night night.
God bless!

I have no life.
I work around 75 hours a week.
I'm completely exhausted.
I wish I could sleep for 4 days straight.
Tomorrow is the stupid ribbon cutting and I'll be the only one there because my grandma has to go to the doctor and dad has to take her.
It's really pretty stupid. 
I dont want my picture in the Walton Tribune.
Noone ever calls anymore.
You'd think I'd know better by now. 
I do, but I always have this naivety about me that thinks maybe this time will be different.
Time to see if I have any pants that will fit and match my new shirt for that crap tomorrow.

anthony and chelsea came out with a lot of people. they were really good. but the night made me unbearably sad. 

sitting at the dinner table listening to my grandmother reminisce about her childhood in naples is nice.

my dad screaming at me ever waking second i'm not busting my ass at the shop, is not.

my parents moved out of the house. more sadness.

life kind of sucks right now. at least i get to look upon that very attractive young bankers face almost every day. bill... i think. gorgeous big brown eyes, beautiful smile, boyish haircut, about 6'3. mmm...

I suddenly got very depressed. I think it's just that whole "my-friends-don't-give-a-crap-about-me" thing. Leigh is the only one who calls anymore. I need to get some time to go there so I can do her hair. Part of me thought that that was the only reason she was calling, but she called me way before that even came up.

Anthony and that Chelsea girl are coming to play at the shop Saturday. Ant says a lot of people are coming. I hope so. A:I want to see people and B:Maybe we can do a decent amount of business. We put another article in the paper with coupons and "Live acoustic music Saturday" on it. I hope people come out. I'm gonna make some fliers tonight with that on it to pass out around the square and elsewhere in town.

This mid 90's to 100 degree weather has got to stop!! Take us down a few notches please.

Made dinner...where the crap is everyone...?

Opening tomorrow.
Scared a little.
And annoyed that we're having to do all of the prices last minute. I'd like to open Monday. Ugh.

Wish us luck~

I just scraped grout off of the bathroom floor in the shop-this lasted for about 3 or more hours. My hands are killing me.
The inspector is coming tomorrow(today). Scary. This woman is a nazi. I swear! Nazi health inspector.

I'm so tired. I have to be back up in about 5/6 hours. Aaaahhh!!! 

Ok. I'm out. 

Pray for us if you pray. Please. <3

P.S.
It kind of breaks my heart that my "friends" never return my calls or call period. It hurts to see pictures of them with other people-to know that they're happy with these new people and that my not being in their lives makes no difference. But I should know better than to count on other people by now.

I am soooo tired. I've never worked so much and so hard before in my life. I was really looking forward to coming home and laying down after my adjustment(like i'm supposed to do), but i drove by the shop and my dad was there. I ended up having to move stuff and make a bunch of phone calls and unload the supplies we bought today. and then i had to drive to lawrenceville to get ais. then to donald's. then i decided to go to bojangles and get a late dinner. took them between 10 and 15 minutes to get my order out. drove bak to my mom's. loaded stuff. and drove back to monroe. too much driving. we got $386 worth of cakes today. from the same bakery that supplies intermezzo. ooh la la! intermezzo charges $8 a slice. they have got to make a fortune considering how cheap the bakery sells them for. they're amazing cakes. i can't believe they're so cheap. i hope once we get the other location and i can actually start baking, ours turn out that well. if the greasetrap inspector and the health inspector show up when they're supposed to, we'll be opening next week. people have been calling and coming by asking when we're opening. and one of the ladies who was painting the building said an old man walked by and demanded we "open already". haha i think we're going to do well.... the building looks really good. the inside is looking pretty good(if i could just finish the bathroom). i'm starting to get excited. COME SEE ME!! p.s.-Jesus and i are doing better. if anyone was wondering about that.

I did good yesterday. Didn't eat nearly as much as usual and managed to not go crazy. I stopped eating somewhere between 5:30 and 6. So, as of right now, it's been at least 15 hours since I last ate. I told God I gave Him the rest of the day. That was the only thing that kept me from snacking with my dad at 10:00 at night. There was no way I was going to break that promise to Him. 

I think I'll be ok.

I feel bad because my dad has been at the shop for about an hour and I'm still here. But I'm only here because I'm waiting for my clothes to dry. He washed clothes last night, put them in the dryer and then turned it off later because he didn't want to hear the dryer while he was trying to sleep. But that set me back since my clothes were in the washer. Blah.

I found my old glasses. The semi cat-eyed ones. I broke one of the ear pieces off(which is why I got the newer pair). So, I just glued it back on. Hopefully it will stay. It's been about 3 months since I lost my (newer)glasses-maybe longer-and my contacts really need to go. I've been wearing them since October.

We're looking to open next week. I had really hoped for a couple of days away before opening. Oh well.

Pointless entry. Sorry.
Hope everyone has a good day!:)
God bless~

32 pounds?! No flippin way. I think my dad's scale is wrong. It HAS to be! Last time I weighed myself, I had gained  22. There's no way I've gained 10 more yet LOST half an inch around my hips. I need to get my scale. Or sneak on the one in the chiro's office. Or avoid them all like the plague until I've gotten some inches off. 
This sucks. That job destroyed me. I gained a crap load of weight, started drinking again, smoking like a chimney, and smoking something else.... I dont anymore! Just want to make that clear. But man...those 7 months were not good. Not good at all....

I have to go back to Home Depot(I swear, I'm there 4 times a day sometimes) and then to Wal Mart. When I get back, it's me and the Gazelle. I don't care if my hip pops out of place again and I end up walking around with a limp because my right leg is "shorter"-as long as I lose some of this God awful fat!

I have to miss the Avatar movie...bummer. I'm such a kid.
